    @allure.title(
        "Test to validate error message that the user who didn't start the task should not be able to execute the task "
        "with solo task lock")
    @allure.description(
        "This testcase tests that user who didn't start the task should not be able to execute the task with solo task")
    @allure.link("https://app.clickup.com/t/86cv0hver")
    @pytest.mark.scenario
    @pytest.mark.job
    @pytest.mark.solo_task_lock
    @pytest.mark.parametrize("job_execution_by, users_list", [("user", [Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"),
                                                                        Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_USERNAME_01")]),
                                                              ("user_group", [])])
    def test_validate_user_cannot_execute_task_with_solo_task_lock(self, job_execution_by, users_list,
                                                                   user_group_creation):
        process_data = self.solo_task_lock_obj.test_add_solo_task_lock()
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_PUBLISHER_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.assign_user_and_user_group_to_process(job_execution_by, users_list, user_group_creation,
                                                           all_task_assignmnet=True)
        self.job_obj.create_job()
        self.job_obj.start_job()
        self.job_obj.start_task(task_name_01)
        logout()
    
        login(Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_USERNAME_01"), Env.get_env_data("QA_ADMIN_PASSWORD_01"))
        select_facility(const.FACILITY_NAME)
        select_usecase(const.USECASE_NAME)
        self.job_obj.get_specific_job()
        error_message = self.job_obj.execute_parameter(task_name_01, process_data["image_capture"], data=None,
                                                       negative_testcase=True)
        if not error_message.startswith("This task is currently in progress and has been locked for solo execution by"):
